+------------------------+
| Table (one)            |
+========================+
| table                  |
+-------------+----------+
| table-row   | one      |
+-------------+----------+
| table-row   | one      |
+-------------+----------+

+----------------------------------+
| Table (two)                      |
+==================================+
| table-2-columns                  |
+-------------+----------+---------+
| table-col-2 | one      | two     |
+-------------+----------+---------+
| table-col-2 | one      | two     |
+-------------+----------+---------+

+--------------------------------------------+
| Table (three)                              |
+============================================+
| table-3-columns                            |
+-------------+----------+---------+---------+
| table-col-3 | one      | two     | three   |
+-------------+----------+---------+---------+
| table-col-3 | one      | two     | three   |
+-------------+----------+---------+---------+

+------------------------------------------------------+
| Table (four)                                         |
+=============+==========+=========+=========+=========+
| table-4-columns                                      |
+-------------+----------+---------+---------+---------+
| table-col-4 | one      | two     | three   | four    |
+-------------+----------+---------+---------+---------+
| table-col-4 | one      | two     | three   | four    |
+-------------+----------+---------+---------+---------+
